member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode
member.summary: Class that stores information about class node in XML file. It obtain information about all properties, method and states.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode.m_Type
member.summary: Stores class type for current instance.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode.m_StatesMap
member.summary: Using this dictionary you can retrieve XML node for specified state.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode.Key
member.summary: Returns class type. This property is needed only for storing instance in KeyedMap collection.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode.StatesMap
member.summary: Returns map: State name -> XML node.

member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.IClassInfo
member.summary: Interface for bussines classes which allows schema object to be build for specific instance of bussines class

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.IClassInfo.Type
member.summary: returns bussines logic name of class

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.IClassInfo.StateComponents
member.summary: returs array of strings which are component parts of global state name. Part with highest priority must be first and so on...

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.m_Instance
member.summary: This is the one instance of this type.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.m_IsInitialized
member.summary: Indicates that schema was already loaded.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.m_NsMgr
member.summary: Namespace manager for internal XPath purposes.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.m_Classes
member.summary: Saves a correspondence map: Class type -> Class description.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.m_Enums
member.summary: Saves a correspondence map: Enum type name -> Enum description.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.GetObjectType(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns string than represents object type and its assembly. You can use this function to identify objects types in schema.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.InitSchema(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method creates singleton instance of MetaData class. You must call this method before using MetaData instance. Culture identifier. Schema file (.xml). Schema description file (.xsd).

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.DeinitSchema
member.remarks: You must use this function to reinitialize schema.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.GetEnumInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns description for specified enum type.
member.param: Full type name of enum type.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.GetPropSetInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns PropSet description by his name.
member.returns: PropSetInfo instance - if schema contains description for specified name, null - otherwise.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.initialize(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method perform schema loading and building program structures.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.Instance
member.summary: A method returning a reference to the Singleton.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.IsInitialized
member.summary: Indicates that schema was already loaded.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.Item(Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.IClassInfo,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets description for object in specified state
member.remarks: Putting null by stateComponents means work with current object state

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.PropSetsNames
member.summary: Gets enumeration of all available PropSets.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.MetaData.XMLNsMgr
member.summary: Gets instance of Namespace manager for internal XPath purposes.

member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClass
member.summary: This class gives full information about current state of IStateInfo object.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClass.#ctor(Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.IClassInfo,Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.ClassNode,System.String[])
member.remarks: Putting null by stateComponents means work with current object state

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClass.defineStateMask(System.String[])
member.summary: Define mask for specified object state

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClass.defineStateName
member.summary: Retrieves current state name and stores it in private field.

member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClassMember
member.summary: Class member information abstract class. Implement shared properties, such as: Name, Caption and Description.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClassMember.Name
member.summary: Gets, sets member's name. Setter is internal only.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClassMember.Caption
member.summary: Gets, sets class member user acceptance name. Setter is internal only.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClassMember.Description
member.summary: Gets, sets class member description msg. Setter is internal only.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SClassMember.DisplayOrder
member.summary: Gets, sets class display position. Setter is internal only.

member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty
member.summary: This class is used to store class's property information

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.m_Type
member.summary: Stores property type. Available types: Byte, SByte, Int16, Int32, Int64, UInt16, UInt32, UInt64, Decimal String, Char, Boolean, DateTime, Single, Double, Stream and enums.

member.name: F:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.m_DefaultValue
member.summary: Stores default value of property. Stored as string. Convertion to another type and check needed to be performed in class that uses it.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.SetDefaultValue(System.String)
member.summary: Translates string representation of default value to properly type and stores it.

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.IsRequired
member.summary: Property accessor to m_isRequired. Set accessor has only internal access modifier

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.DefaultValue
member.summary: Property accessor to m_defaultValue. Set accessor has only internal access modifier

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SProperty.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Property accessor to m_IsReadOnly. Set accessor has only internal access modifier

member.name: P:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.SMethod.IsAvailable
member.summary: Property accessor to m_isAvailable. Set accessor has only internal access modifier

member.name: T:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.Tools
member.summary: This class is created only for internal purposes.

member.name: M:Toolkit.Workflow.Schema.Tools.GetLocalizedString(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Gets localized string for specified node. First it search for "localizedSuffix" node and if it not present search for "suffix" node.
member.returns: Null if string with specified suffix is not founded otherwise returns desired value.
